mutants.code:
from math import hypot

def calculate_max_circle_radius(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    a = hypot(x1 - x2, y1 - y2)
    b = hypot(x2 - x3, y2 - y3)
    c = hypot(x3 - x1, y3 - y1)
    area = abs((x2 - x1) * (y3 - y1) - (x3 - x1) * (y2 - y1))
    R = area * (a + b + c)
    m = max(a, b, c)
    r = m / (2 + m / R)
    return round(r, 12)

    R = area // (a + b + c)
    m = max(a, b, c)
    r = m / (2 + m / R)

    a = hypot(x1 - x2, y1 - y2)
    b = hypot(x2 - x3, y2 - y3)
    c = hypot(x3 - x1, y3 - y1)
    area = abs((x2 - x1) * (y3 * y1) - (x3 - x1) * (y2 - y1))
    R = area / (a + b + c)
    m = max(a, b, c)
    r = m / (2 + m / R)
    return round(r, 12)

from math import hypot

def calculate_max_circle_radius(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    a = hypot(x1 - x2, y1 - y2)
    b = hypot(x2 - x3, y2 - y3)
    c = hypot(x3 - x1, y3 - y1)
    area = abs((x2 - x1) * (y3 - y1) - (x3 + x1) * (y2 - y1))
    R = area / (a + b + c)
    m = max(a, b, c)
    r = m / (2 + m / R)
    return round(r, 12)

from math import hypot

def calculate_max_circle_radius(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3):
    a = hypot(x1 - x2, y1 - y2)
    b = hypot(x2 - x3, y2 - y3)
    c = hypot(x3 - x1, y3 - y1)
    area = abs((x2 - x1) * (y3 - y1) - (x3 - x1) * (y2 * y1))
    R = area / (a + b + c)
    m = max(a, b, c)
    r = m / (2 + m / R)
    return round(r, 12)
